name: Tower Defense Makercito
description:
As a tutorial has not yet been introduced in the game, here we explain the controls:

 -left click to select and place turrets 

-right click to upgrade turrets 

-keyboard arrows to assign a direction to certain turrets 

-keys 1 and 4 to increase the speed respectively.

This early version of the game contains: 

- 10 different turrets 

- + 15 enemies 

- 1 boss 

- 4 maps
